skills.skill: PhD in Physics or Astronomy Science

duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate with scientists, managers, or committees to provide technical oversight for the applications.
Identify requirements and use cases the applications must satisfy.
Analyze and evaluate algorithms and algorithm performance, diagnose data and software problems.
Design, develop, debug, and maintain calibration pipeline and software documentation, code, and operator instructions.
Assist those using the application or computer system.
Assess quality of calibrated data resulting from pipeline implementations.
Investigate and implement algorithmic methods to improve pipelines in performance and output quality.
Investigate and implement methods of automating manual computing tasks related to DKIST calibration pipelines.

education_certification.credential: PhD in Physics or Astronomy Science
